thread.title: Phil Holbrook

author: Phil Holbrook
title: Phil Holbrook
text: It worked out cheaper to have my two rear tyres changed at home than drive to my nearest cheapest supplier. Steve was very polite and professional and got the job done quickly as well as checking the other tyres and discs and pads. I didn't opt to specify a time, but I got a 2 hour window emailed to me in the morning and Steve rang to advise when he was on his way.
